categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Bran Ath'Morath was a male Jedi Master of the Jedi Order. According to legend, Ath'Morath was a rival of the Sith Lord Darth Caldoth, who lured the Jedi into a battle on the world of Kizan. While the battle remained equally matched, Caldoth purposefully allowed Ath'Morath's lightsaber to pierce himself through the shoulder, beheading the Jedi while he was still shocked at what Caldoth had done. He wielded a yellow bladed lightsaber.
